issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Titanium SDK version 3.2.0.GA
CLI version 3.2.0
Alloy 1.0
OS: Windows 7
Emulator: android 4.4

I'm just now beginning Titanium and application development. I can't get the emulator to run the sample code. The following error occurs:

[ERROR] :  Emulator failed to start in a timely manner
The current timeout is set to 120000 ms
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1

Any help will be appreciated.

comments.body: Android emulator can be tricky at times and you may run into this error at times. I would suggest you to close the Android emulator and Studio and then relaunch the Studio. Run a project on Android emulator and make sure to unlock the emulator once you see the emulator lock screen. Let us know how it goes.
Marking this resolved since the issue is not reproducible.
